climbs.name: Celine
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, Tim Pinar, Frazier Haney

content.description: This is a cool route, and has some interesting and challenging climbing on it.  The climb has about 5 or 6 bolts on it, but you need to place one or two smallish cams  (1 1/2 inch about). The top is steep and grainy; got to love it.
content.location: East face (left side) of Hodgepodge Rock.

climbs.name: Unconscionable!
climbs.fa: TR: Shelby Beardslee, Andrew Jones FFA: Tony Sartin

content.description:
un·con·scion·a·ble/ˌənˈkänSH(ə)nəbəl/

Adjective:

Not right or reasonable.

Unreasonably excessive.

Synonyms:

unscrupulous - unreasonable - inordinate - excessive
content.location: On the northeast face of Hodgepodge Rock the route starts underneath the corner of the roof following a thin right facing corner to the roof. Pass 2 bolts, pull the roof and continue up on the next tier in the center of the face on good holds past 3 more bolts. Walk off the back and left back into site 4 or 5.
